title: Seismic Moves
description:
Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon discuss what Kevin Durant’s future holds after requesting a trade from the Nets and what USC and UCLA joining to the Big Ten means for College Football.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:subtitle: PTI: Kevin Durant requests a trade, and The Big Ten just got two teams bigger.
